video.title: Power Rangers Ninja Storm
video.synopsis: When the elite warriors from the Wind Ninja Academy are captured by the evil Lothor, Shane, Tori and Waldo become Wind Power Rangers to fight back.

episodes.synopsis: When all the Ninja Academies in the world are destroyed by Lothor, only three young students -- Shane, Tori and Dustin -- are not captured.
episodes.title: Prelude to a Storm

episodes.synopsis: When Shane decides to take on the Mad Magnet monster by himself, he learns that it takes teamwork and trust to overcome obstacles.
episodes.title: There's No 'I' in Team

episodes.synopsis: When Lothor's minions appeal to Tori's vanity, they lure her to a photo shoot and then create her doppelganger to help them infiltrate the Ninja Ops.
episodes.title: Beauty and the Beach

episodes.synopsis: The others question Dustin's commitment to the Rangers when it seems he is spending too much time with his new motocross buddies, Blake and Hunter.
episodes.title: Looming Thunder

episodes.synopsis: The Thunder Rangers use the Tsunami Cycles and their Thunder Megazord to try to defeat the Wind Rangers.
episodes.title: Thunder Strangers: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Amphibidor monster tries to drain the city dry. Hunter and Blake reveal their true identities.
episodes.title: Thunder Strangers: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Hunter and Blake meet the ghosts of their parents in the Cavern of Lost Ninjas, they learn that Lothor was responsible for their parents' deaths.
episodes.title: Thunder Strangers: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: The Power Rangers defend the city against Florabundacus, an evil monster who tries to destroy the world with carnivorous plants.
episodes.title: Nowhere to Grow

episodes.synopsis: When Lothor tries to use the Snipster to break up an international peace conference, the Power Rangers must use their inner ninja skills.
episodes.title: Snip It, Snip It Good

episodes.synopsis: Hunter and Blake are fooled by Choobo, who erases their memories and pits them against the Wind Rangers.
episodes.title: Return of Thunder: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: All of the Rangers are transported to a sinking island where they battle each other.
episodes.title: Return of Thunder: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Blake and the Wind Rangers must find a way to break Choobo's spell over Hunter.
episodes.title: Return of Thunder: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Choobo takes his last stand against the Power Rangers.
episodes.title: Return of Thunder: Part 4

episodes.synopsis: Marah and Kapri send their alien boxing instructor, the Boxing Bopp-a-Roo, to disrupt the Total Trek race that Shane and Hunter are running.
episodes.title: Boxing Bopp-a-Roo

episodes.synopsis: The Power Rangers fight against Trayf, the Pig Monster, who traps them in his nightmare world.
episodes.title: Pork Chopped

episodes.synopsis: Cam and his father quarrel because the Sensei is overprotective. Madtropolis drains the Rangers of their powers.
episodes.title: Samurai's Journey: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Cam travels back in time to the Wind Ninja Academy to gain the powers he needs to become the Green Ranger.
episodes.title: Samurai's Journey: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Lothor seeks revenge on Cam by sending five monsters at once to destroy the city.
episodes.title: Samurai's Journey: Part 3

episodes.synopsis: Cam's weird behavior comes at a bad time when Fragra captures two of the Rangers in perfume bottles.
episodes.title: Scent of a Ranger

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to win over the hearts and minds of people on Earth, Lothor and Mr. Ratwell produce a sitcom and administer a love potion.
episodes.title: I Love Lothor

episodes.synopsis: Hunter mentors a kid who happens to acquire Lothor's Personal Alien Manager; the teens are excited about an action sports video contest.
episodes.title: Good Will Hunter

episodes.synopsis: Marah convinces Dustin that she wants to become a good person when she is replaced in the Lair by her friend Beevil.
episodes.title: All About Beevil

episodes.synopsis: In an attempt to make his father human again, Cam builds a machine that accidentally turns Sensei into Shane -- leaving Shane a guinea pig.
episodes.title: Sensei Switcheroo

episodes.synopsis: Dustin lets a bit of fame go to his head. Meanwhile, the Slob Goblin monster attacks the city, turning people into stamps.
episodes.title: Tongue and Cheek

episodes.synopsis: A mild-mannered mechanic turns into a mutant creature that wants Crimson Ranger's power for a bizarre experiment.
episodes.title: Brothers in arms

episodes.synopsis: A benevolent alien comes to Earth searching for a Red Power Ranger, while Sensei sends Shane on a life journey.
episodes.title: Shane's Karma: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Shane receives a powerful gift from Skyla, while the Rangers continue to fight Zurgane Zord.
episodes.title: Shane's Karma: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: As the teens prepare for a televised talent show, Motodrone brings to life Shimazu and the three Wolfblades.
episodes.title: Shimazu Returns: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Cam must use all the Rangers' power disks to summon a new weapon strong enough to defeat Wolfblades.
episodes.title: Shimazu Returns: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Tori finds herself in a bizarre dimension where everything is the opposite of what she knows.
episodes.title: The Wild Wipeout

episodes.synopsis: Blake secretly trains with a new weapon that is tested when the Inflatron monster attacks.
episodes.title: Double-Edged Blake

episodes.synopsis: Shane is worried when his judgmental older brother comes to visit. The Eyezak monster makes the Rangers see their greatest fears.
episodes.title: Eye of the Storm

episodes.synopsis: The guys' plans to go camping are interrupted when Zurgane decides to defeat the Rangers on his own.
episodes.title: General Deception, Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Zurgane makes a last attempt to defeat the Rangers.
episodes.title: General Deception: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Cam uses the Gem of Souls to power a new vehicle.
episodes.title: A Gem of a Day

episodes.synopsis: Marah and Kapri team up with Shimazu and attack the evil Zords. Blake and Hunter get in an argument.
episodes.title: Down and Dirty

episodes.synopsis: Lothor begins his ultimate plan to take over the Earth.
episodes.title: Storm Before the Calm: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Rangers must stop Lothor from opening the Abyss of Evil.
episodes.title: Storm Before the Calm: Part 2
